Index.faqAnswer1: Click the download button after finishing your design

Index.faqAnswer2: Yes, you can upload any image as background
Index.faqQuestion3: Is this tool free to use?
Index.faqAnswer3: Yes, it's completely free with no hidden charges

BlackScreen.seoTitle: Black Screen Generator - Create Pure Black Backgrounds
BlackScreen.seoDescription: Generate pure black screens for OLED displays, dark mode testing, and energy saving. Customize and download high-quality black backgrounds.

BlackScreen.feature1Desc: True black saves power on OLED displays
BlackScreen.feature2Desc: Perfect for testing dark mode interfaces
BlackScreen.feature3Desc: Crisp, pure black backgrounds at any resolution
BlackScreen.ctaSubtitle: Start using your perfect black background now

WhiteScreen.seoTitle: White Screen Generator - Create Pure White Backgrounds
WhiteScreen.seoDescription: Generate pure white screens for display testing, light mode testing, and calibration. Customize and download high-quality white backgrounds.
WhiteScreen.heroSubtitle: Create perfect white backgrounds for your devices
WhiteScreen.feature1Desc: Pure white helps detect dead pixels and screen uniformity
WhiteScreen.feature2Desc: Perfect for testing light mode interfaces
WhiteScreen.feature3Desc: Crisp, pure white backgrounds at any resolution
WhiteScreen.ctaSubtitle: Start using your perfect white background now
